message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I had a higher price in mind, I'm willing to negotiate. How about we meet halfway at $17,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I can do $16,000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
